Name: Addington
Ingredients: 30 ml Thomas Henry Soda Water chilled
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
TOP with a splash of chilled soda from a bottle/can or just the merest squirt from a chilled soda siphon.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Substituting vermouths (go high-end) dramatically alters the character of this light and easy aperitivo.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Addington contains 81 calories
